1601352000.title: BBC World News
1601352000.descr: The latest news, bought to you by the BBC, 24-hours a day. All the latest updates from the world of politics, business, education, health, sports and the arts, both nationally and internationally.

1601361000.title: Treasures of Ancient Greece
1601361000.descr: Engrossing three-part documentary series, hosted by Alastair Sooke, that explores the unique legacy of Greek art- sculpture, philosophy, poetry and theatre, examining its origins, expansion and how the Greek masterpieces changed and influenced western culture.

1601362800.title: BBC World News
1601362800.descr: The latest news, bought to you by the BBC, 24-hours a day. All the latest updates from the world of politics, business, education, health, sports and the arts, both nationally and internationally.

1601364600.title: Witness History
1601364600.descr: Witness History is the BBC's weekly history program, that takes us back to the remarkable moments of history. People who were there tell us what really happened, what they saw and what they did, people who were the witnesses, the survivors, the participants in history-changing events of the past. Find out new pieces of history puzzles and listen to the true stories.

1601366400.title: BBC World News
1601366400.descr: The latest news, bought to you by the BBC, 24-hours a day. All the latest updates from the world of politics, business, education, health, sports and the arts, both nationally and internationally.

1601368200.title: HARDtalk
1601368200.descr: HARDtalk is an interview programme on a one-on-one basis where prominent international personalities including presidents and prime ministers of several countries, leading cultural figures, scientists, actors, influencers are being interviewed. The hosts are genuine experts who always get to the core of every topic, get all the answers from the guests so that the viewers see the whole picture.

1601370000.title: BBC News
1601370000.descr: All the latest news from the BBC, which is a service provider funded by a licencing fee paid by British households. It is regulated by Ofcom, and aims to educate and inform, but also entertain, it's audience. The content produced by the BBC is intended to be impartial, and it was established in 1922, with headquarters in Westminster, London.

1601397000.title: The Travel Show
1601397000.descr: Join the Travel Show team as they travel across the world visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as some hidden gems, from eco skiing in Denmark to glaciers in Iceland. Your adventure starts here.

1601400600.title: BBC Focus on Africa
1601400600.descr: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. It includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

1601402400.title: Outside Source
1601402400.descr: Outside Source is a news programme produced by the BBC and broadcasted from Monday to Thursday. It uses social media and touch-screen technology in the presentation of its stories, which gives a new, digital style to live video news.

1601418600.title: Asia Business Report
1601418600.descr: Asia Business Report is a BBC-produced informational television program covering the latest news and issues in the world of business on the Asian continent. Join to find out all the biggest stories from Asia's business market, through live broadcast from the BBC studio in Singapore.

1601419500.title: Sport Today
1601419500.descr: Sport Today is a television program in which BBC covers the biggest sport stories of the day from all around the world.
